attributes.action: reward J. K. Rowling in the New Year's Honour List.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jo Rowling has captured the imagination of British children and adults, as well as people all over the world with her Harry Potter series.  Her writing has encouraged people of all ages to read; she has used her self-made money to help others less fortunate; she has helped the British film-industry through the films of her books being made in Britain and with British actors and she has promoted a modern and moral view of Britain throughout the world at a time when the international view of Britain has not always been strong.

For these services to the country, she deserves to be thanked by the Britain for the joy she has brought to millions.
